item.title: Project Single
item.dc:creator: silvertech@admin
item.content:encoded:
At Serenity Apartments at NYC you can experience affordable living in a convenient location. Our spacious one, two and, three bedroom apartment homes feature major kitchen appliances, open living room, and dining spaces and large closets. Select units also feature private terraces and recent upgrades such as new cabinets, counter tops, appliances, and more.

The pandemic has had ramifications for many companies, creating uncertain futures for businesses as they work to innovate and adapt to the "new normal." Read More Discover how tech is changing the nature of business Program & Project Management

While many of our clients face similar business and technology challenges, no two businesses are alike. A successful business cannot be built without a well-defined business strategy.

A well-defined strategy is only as good as the plan put in place to operationalize it. We recognize that every business is unique and therefore requires a customized strategic roadmap.

[rev_slider alias="slider-5" slidertitle="Slider 5"][/rev_slider] Learn about our services to help you strengthen your business We are a global firm providing IT solutions and services to organizations of all sizes across various industries Complexity becomes simplicity with us A Professional Leadership Team While many of our clients face similar business and technology challenges, no two businesses are alike. A successful business cannot be built without a well-defined business strategy. Reduce IT costs & increase operational efficiency

Application Development

Application Development

Our proven team can design a solution that will address your specific requirements.

Maintaining IT systems

Maintaining IT systems

Our proven team can design a solution that will address your specific requirements. Remote IT infrastructure management services We provide a full spectrum of managed services to support organizations that lack the time or talent to manage their technology in-house to the level they desire. Get Started We deliver efficient solutions at the speed of change Discover how technology is changing the nature of services and delivery with us

Fast and Effective Delivery

Fast and Effective Delivery

We are extremely client focused. Our decisions are driven by a client first mindset. Discover Now

Hands on Leadership

Hands on Leadership

We are extremely client focused. Our decisions are driven by a client first mindset. Discover Now

Client First Mindset

Client First Mindset

item.title: Home 08
item.dc:creator: silvertech@admin
item.content:encoded:
[rev_slider alias="slider-8" slidertitle="Slider 8"][/rev_slider] Drive engagement. Fuel conversion. Maximize results. Organise your schedule, projects and finances in one app Optimize the entire customer experience, all within a single app

Take control of your schedule

Check your schedule in a simple chronological list. Move things around by dragging work from day-today, or add projects at any time.

Learn More

Manage your client projects

Check your schedule in a simple chronological list. Move things around by dragging work from day-today, or add projects at any time.

Learn More

Automatic invoice reminders

Check your schedule in a simple chronological list. Move things around by dragging work from day-today, or add projects at any time.

Learn More

Keep track of your finances

Check your schedule in a simple chronological list. Move things around by dragging work from day-today, or add projects at any time.

Learn More k

Google Play

72K+ Reviews K

App Store

30K+ reviews K

Active Users

90K+ Ratings /10

The Verge

2,700 Ratings Stay up to date, plan and collaborate in real time Dive into the details by adding comments, attachments, due dates, and more directly to the cards. Collaborate on projects from beginning to end. We’ve got the flexibility & features to fit any team’s style. Get Started Beautifully simple project planning Plan work, keep projects on track, and manage team workloads Our Services

Built-in project analysis

Compare the time you've spent against your estimates. No more guessing which projects are profitable. Read More

Real-time healthchecks

Compare the time you've spent against your estimates. No more guessing which projects are profitable. Read More

A simple view of your schedule

Compare the time you've spent against your estimates. No more guessing which projects are profitable. Read More

Custom financial targets

Compare the time you've spent against your estimates. No more guessing which projects are profitable. Read More That means less stress and better results A project planner that won't let anything slip through the cracks Use team view to get the best group overview

Plan projects with ease

Plan projects with ease

We can help you identify opportunities and assess the gaps in your Business Applications landscape.

Keep teams on track

Keep teams on track

We can help you identify opportunities and assess the gaps in your Business Applications landscape.

Kick stress to the curb

Kick stress to the curb

We can help you identify opportunities and assess the gaps in your Business Applications landscape. Learn More What our clients are saying about us and discover how we are helping their teams We are honoured to work with a wide variety of clients, and every project we carry out is unique

Thomas Smith

TechCo Inc

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: silvertech@admin
item.content:encoded:
We are a team that creates digital landscapes for startups From our headquarters in New York City, we combine with DevOps to bring the best of technology to projects all across the World Stay up to date, plan and collaborate in real time Dive into the details by adding comments, attachments, due dates, and more directly to the cards. Collaborate on projects from beginning to end. We’ve got the flexibility & features to fit any team’s style. Our Services IT services that adapt to your evolving business Program & Project Management We provide the IT training and support needed to power your workforce, suggesting an IT strategy that perfectly fits into your business. Consulting & IT Leadership We provide the IT training and support needed to power your workforce, suggesting an IT strategy that perfectly fits into your business. Get Started Work on big ideas, without the busywork Case studies - SilverTech’s IT success stories Meet Our Customers

How a prototype for TechCo shook up payments

Business Technology EvaluationA flexible technology foundation should only come from well managed strategic IT consulting services.

Preparing startups for its digital future

IT Strategy and PlanningA flexible technology foundation should only come from well managed strategic IT consulting services.

How a responsive app drove new business

IT Consulting ServicesA flexible technology foundation should only come from well managed strategic IT consulting services. We empower clients to grow their businesses based on the effective use of technology We can evaluate, design and execute the right technology strategies that will help your business operate at peak performance.

[mc4wp_form id="589"]

Your information is 100% secure. We don't do spam!

item.title: Contact Us
item.dc:creator: silvertech@admin
item.content:encoded:
Discover how tech is changing the nature of business Program & Project Management

While many of our clients face similar business and technology challenges, no two businesses are alike. A successful business cannot be built without a well-defined business strategy.

A well-defined strategy is only as good as the plan put in place to operationalize it. We recognize that every business is unique and therefore requires a customized strategic roadmap.

Watch Demo Now Please use the form below for business inquiries


    What our clients are saying about us and discover how we are helping their teams We are honoured to work with a wide variety of clients, and every project we carry out is unique

    Eloise Smith

    TechCo Inc

    “Our company grossed a decent amount of money; we provided good services and had many satisfied customers”

    Eloise Smith

    TechCo Inc

    “Our company grossed a decent amount of money; we provided good services and had many satisfied customers”

    Answers to frequently asked questions about information technology

    Business Consulting

    Business Consulting

    We can help you identify opportunities and assess the gaps in your Business Applications landscape.

    Remote IT Factory

    Remote IT Factory

    We can help you identify opportunities and assess the gaps in your Business Applications landscape.

    Digital Workplace

    Digital Workplace

    We can help you identify opportunities and assess the gaps in your Business Applications landscape. We operate comprehensive compliance and assurance programs. Learn more about our plans Want to get in touch with us? Let’s talk

    Our Location in NY

    Our Location in NY

    112 W 34th St, New York City.

    (+1) 212-946-2707

    (+1) 212-946-2707

    Let us know how we can help.

    hola@SilverTech.com

    hola@SilverTech.com

    Learn more about our products. We empower clients to grow their businesses based on the effective use of technology We can evaluate, design and execute the right technology strategies that will help your business operate at peak performance.

    [mc4wp_form id="589"]

    Your information is 100% secure. We don't do spam!

item.title: Our Services
item.dc:creator: silvertech@admin
item.content:encoded:
Learn about our services to help you strengthen your business We are a global firm providing IT solutions and services to organizations of all sizes across various industries

App Development

App Development

It encompasses developing apps for phones, tablets, smart watches, and all other kinds of wearable devices.

IT Consulting

IT Consulting

It encompasses developing apps for phones, tablets, smart watches, and all other kinds of wearable devices.

Data Science

Data Science

It encompasses developing apps for phones, tablets, smart watches, and all other kinds of wearable devices.

Quality Assurance

Quality Assurance

It encompasses developing apps for phones, tablets, smart watches, and all other kinds of wearable devices.

Web Development

Web Development

It encompasses developing apps for phones, tablets, smart watches, and all other kinds of wearable devices.

UX Design

UX Design

It encompasses developing apps for phones, tablets, smart watches, and all other kinds of wearable devices. Do you want to try one of our IT services? We nourish businesses growth through innovation and technology Get Started Contact Us We believe that by working together, we do better New technology represents a bigger potential for companies and organisations to be more efficient. You will get the most value by utilising the technology to digitise and increase the efficiency of both internal work processes and customer interaction. About Us k

Fortune 500

3,500 Ratings M

Global 2000

2,700 Ratings +

Active Users

5,500 Ratings +

Tech Lead

3,500 Ratings All the latest technology and fintech news The fastest and easiest way to stay up to date on fintech news Meet Our Customers January 19, 2021. 5:57 AMIt Solution

Seasoned CEO creates guide for navigating startups in the tech age

James McCann seasoned CEO, speaker, and advisor to early-stage businesses, today announced the publication of Startups & The Tech Revolution. Read More January 19, 2021. 5:55 AMIt Solution

How fintech businesses can help protect the industry’s future

The pandemic has had ramifications for many companies, creating uncertain futures for businesses as they work to innovate and adapt to the "new normal." Read More January 19, 2021. 5:46 AMIt Solution

What are the payment technology trends that no one is talking about?

James McCann seasoned CEO, speaker, and advisor to early-stage businesses, today announced the publication of Startups & The Tech Revolution. Read More We empower clients to grow their businesses based on the effective use of technology We can evaluate, design and execute the right technology strategies that will help your business operate at peak performance.

January 19, 2021. 5:57 AMIt Solution

Seasoned CEO creates guide for navigating startups in the tech age

Cryptocurrency mobile app

Web DevelopmentThe simple, safe way to buy and sell your cryptocurrency. The world's largest cryptocurrency exchange.

Stay on track with apps

Web DevelopmentGet access to everyone in your organization with customizable channels and a team directory.

Bring your team together

Web DevelopmentStand out from the crowd with this unique UI kit perfect for building beautiful web apps and regular web pages.

Dashboard UI Kit

Web DevelopmentA powerful design kit with a huge set of customizable elements, sections, and templates. What our clients are saying about us and discover how we are helping their teams We are honoured to work with a wide variety of clients, and every project we carry out is unique

item.excerpt:encoded: The pandemic has had ramifications for many companies, creating uncertain futures for businesses as they work to innovate and adapt to the "new normal."

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
[{"id":"c161351","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"id":"feb88a1","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"5f482ac","elType":"widget","settings":{"wp":{"title":"","text":"James McCann seasoned CEO, speaker, and advisor to early-stage businesses, today announced the publication of Startups & The Tech Revolution: The Essential Guide (available now). The book is published with ForbesBooks, the exclusive business book publishing imprint of Forbes Media.\r\n
\r\nOver the course of 20 years, James McCann had a C-suite view of the technology revolution and its impact on his own organizations. He knows from first-hand experience what happens when companies refuse to adapt. \u201cThis is a world that is not going to spoon feed you; it moves way too quickly for that,\u201d he said. In Startups & The Tech Revolution, McCann explains that companies that are not prepared for the current technological paradigm and employees who are unwilling to retrain or upskill are exposed to unprecedented risk.","filter":"on","visual":"on"}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"wp-widget-text"},{"id":"5a2fdff","elType":"widget","settings":{"wp":{"title":"","text":"
\u201cA brand for a company is like a reputation for a person. You earn reputation by trying to do hard things well.\u201d Jeff Bezos.<\/blockquote>","filter":"on","visual":"on"}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"wp-widget-text"},{"id":"a1278d4","elType":"widget","settings":{"wp":{"title":"","text":"McCann\u2019s focus is always on the future. He believes that where there is risk, there is also opportunity but, to see and take advantage of it, leaders and employees must be receptive to change. In addition to sharing lessons from his own experience, he cites various studies to shed light on expert predictions and offers a strategic approach to help startup companies Honest and authentic, the leather, aluminum and steel materials are carefully selected for comfort and fit. These expressive and contemporary Bluetooth headphones offer up to 19 hours of playtime per charge, so you can keep the music going while you’re on the move.

The book is published with ForbesBooks, the exclusive business book publishing imprint of Forbes Media.\r\n
\r\nOver the course of 20 years, James McCann had a C-suite view of the technology revolution and its impact on his own organizations. He knows from first-hand experience what happens when companies refuse to adapt. \u201cThis is a world that is not going to spoon feed you; it moves way too quickly for that,\u201d he said. In Startups & The Tech Revolution, McCann explains that companies that are not prepared for the current technological paradigm and employees who are unwilling to retrain or upskill are exposed to unprecedented risk.","filter":"on","visual":"on"}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"wp-widget-text"},{"id":"0932803","elType":"widget","settings":{"wp":{"title":"","text":"

item.dc:creator: silvertech@admin
item.content:encoded:
Enjoy pure sound, pure materials and pure expression with Beoplay H4 wireless headphones. These high quality headphones feature precise Bang & Olufsen Signature Sound; delivering music the way the artist intended it to be heard.
Honest and authentic, the leather, aluminum and steel materials are carefully selected for comfort and fit. These expressive and contemporary Bluetooth headphones offer up to 19 hours of playtime per charge, so you can keep the music going while you’re on the move.

item.title: BeoPlay Beolit 15
item.dc:creator: silvertech@admin
item.content:encoded:
Enjoy pure sound, pure materials and pure expression with Beoplay H4 wireless headphones. These high quality headphones feature precise Bang & Olufsen Signature Sound; delivering music the way the artist intended it to be heard.
Honest and authentic, the leather, aluminum and steel materials are carefully selected for comfort and fit. These expressive and contemporary Bluetooth headphones offer up to 19 hours of playtime per charge, so you can keep the music going while you’re on the move.

item.content:encoded:

item.title: B&O E591 Full Color
item.dc:creator: silvertech@admin
item.content:encoded:
Enjoy pure sound, pure materials and pure expression with Beoplay H4 wireless headphones. These high quality headphones feature precise Bang & Olufsen Signature Sound; delivering music the way the artist intended it to be heard.
Honest and authentic, the leather, aluminum and steel materials are carefully selected for comfort and fit. These expressive and contemporary Bluetooth headphones offer up to 19 hours of playtime per charge, so you can keep the music going while you’re on the move.
item.excerpt:encoded:
• Color
    Black
  • Material Item
    Aluminum, Stainless Steel
  • Dimensions Item
    7.09 x 8.78 x 2.05 Inches
  • Weight
    0.54 Pounds
